name: Panchakarma
description: A comprehensive Ayurvedic detoxification and rejuvenation program designed to cleanse the body of toxins and restore balance.

name: Shirodhara
description: A deeply relaxing treatment where warm herbal oil is gently poured over the forehead to calm the mind and soothe the nervous system.

name: Abhyanga
description: Traditional Ayurvedic oil massage that promotes circulation, detoxification, and deep relaxation using warm herbal oils.

name: Udvartana
description: An invigorating herbal powder massage that helps reduce excess weight, improves skin texture, and enhances circulation.

name: Nasyam
description: A nasal therapy that cleanses and protects the respiratory passages, helpful for sinus issues, headaches, and mental clarity.

name: Kati Basti
description: Specialized treatment for lower back pain where warm medicated oil is retained over the lumbar region to relieve pain and stiffness.

name: Janu Basti
description: Therapeutic treatment for knee joint pain using warm medicated oil to reduce inflammation and improve mobility.

name: Pizhichil
description: The 'Royal Treatment' where streams of warm medicated oil are poured over the body while being gently massaged, deeply nourishing.
